attributes.action: ensure that ALL cars imported into the UK are UK registered/taxed after a maximum of 30 days.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many foreign cars are appearing on our roads daily, often from Poland and other countries in that area, which are here for a period that makes it obvious that they belong to residents, whether temporary or permanent, but retain the registration plates of their country of origin.

This means that they have not paid UK road tax and the cars are not subject to MOT or compliance testing. For this reason, they may also not be insured and this is presumably not traceable on the UK system.

Cars imported into the UK for 30 days or more should be compelled to UK register, pay car tax and have an MOT (where applicable) and compliance check.
